newsitem.title: UK: UK July consumer industry indicator at record high.
newsitem.headline: UK July consumer industry indicator at record high.

text.p: Britain's consumer industries' longer-term leading indicator rose to 106.08 in July, the highest level since its inception in January 1980, from 106.05 in June, NTC Research said.
"The steady rise in the indicator over the past year points to a gradual increase in the rate of economic growth from mid-1996 to mid-1997," it said.
The indicator is compiled from a broad range of variables and NTC said it provides advance indications of turning points in the level of consumers' economic activity.
